name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Dynamic Senior Frontend Engineer with 8 years of experience specializing in modern frontend technologies including **React**, **Next.js**, **TypeScript**, and **Node.js**, adept at delivering high-quality, user-centric applications in the healthcare and financial industries. Proficient in implementing state-of-the-art UI/UX designs, employing skills across **Tailwind**, **Figma**, and **Framer** to create visually appealing interfaces. 

Expert in leveraging AI frameworks such as **OpenAI**, **Hugging Face**, **LangChain**, **Stable Diffusion**, and **Midjourney** to enhance user engagement through intelligent features. Possesses hands-on experience in developing interactive animations and 3D visualizations using **WebGL**, **Three.js**, and **React Three Fiber**.

Strong understanding of modern testing frameworks, including **Cypress**, **Vitest**, and **Playwright**, ensuring robust application performance. Committed to continuous integration and delivery practices within CI/CD environments, consuming **Docker** for containerization. Adept at building responsive applications that comply with security standards.
